name: Building Foundation Mission
description:
Building Foundation Mission is a realistic construction game for families to enjoy this summer season on the miami beach. This simulator construction builder gives you experience of construction games heavy machinery truck driving, digging, cutting, breaking, & destroying in the best of digger simulator excavator games. Drive forklift, trucks and tractor, heavy equipment, heavy duty machinery, heavy duty work as well as gigantic crane construction to heavy duty transport truck driving and ride of loader truck, transport truck and heavy excavator trucks. Build a whole new area in simulator construction building Games with your professional construction games experience.
Features
- Challenging games missions with extreme time limit.
- Realistic HD graphics & engaging sounds
- Environment with most addictive gameplay
- Many hours of free fun of gigantic crane construction and transport duty
- Enjoy super immersive environment and realistic sound effects
- challenges construction games levels and objectives
- Addictive and easy game play of uphill excavator work.
